BusinessLicense.name: BusinessLicense
BusinessLicense.description: Represents the licenses of a party role like healthcare provider or producer.

AccountId.description: The ID of the organization holding the license. This field is a relationship field.

ContactId.description: The ID of the person who holds the license and is listed as a contact. This field is a relationship field.

HealthcareProviderId.description: The ID of the Healthcare Provider who holds this license. This field is a relationship field. This field is a lookup to HealthcareProvider.

Identifier.description: Issuer's ID for the licensee. This field is unique within your organization.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the license is active (true) or not (false). The default value is false.

IsPrimaryLicense.description: Indicates if the license is the primary license. The default value is false.

IssueDate.description: The date the license or certification was issued.

LicenseClass.description: The class that the distributorâ€™s license belongs to.

Name.description: Name of the business or professional license.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record. This field is a polymorphic relationship field.

SourceSystemUpdateDate.description: Represents the date when the record was last updated in the source system.

UserId.description: The person who holds the license and is listed as a user. This field is a relationship field.

VerifiedDate.description: License was validated on this date.
